snippet.title: Monster Arena Walkthrough
snippet.description:
→Description
Train and befriend with your own monster and teach him valuable power, defense, agility and intelligence skills. Praise, train, and battle with nearby monsters who wandered into your neighbourhood. Make your way up into the monster tournament and become the ultimate monster trainer. Welcome in the world of monster!

Choose your type of monster, whether it tough, agile, and other!
Choose your monster class, from mage, assassin, and other!
Battle over dozens of trainers!
Develop your monster status and their abilities!
Join various event!
Explore the Monster Arena world!

→Instructions
Explained in-game

Background Music: Elephants
Artist: Huma-Huma
Game's Creator: LittleGiant

Play the game here: http://www.crazygames.com/game/monster-arena
